data.content:
Draven (Santa Draven)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: December 14, 2012

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is known for his flamboyant personality and showmanship in the League of Legends. With his larger-than-life ego and incredible skill with throwing axes, Draven has become a fan favorite among players. One of his most iconic skins is

which transforms him into a jolly and festive version of himself.

The Santa Draven skin was released on December 14, 2012, just in time for the holiday season. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin gives Draven a complete makeover, turning him into a Santa Claus-like figure. With his red and white suit, fluffy white beard, and a sack full of presents, Santa Draven brings joy and cheer to the Summoner's Rift.

The skin features several unique visual and audio effects that add to the holiday spirit. Draven's spinning axes are replaced with snowflake-shaped blades, and his recall animation shows him riding a sleigh pulled by reindeer. Additionally, his abilities have been modified to match the theme of the skin. For example, his Blood Rush ability leaves behind a trail of snowflakes as he moves, and his ultimate ability, Whirling Death, now features spinning candy canes.

But what is the story behind Santa Draven? How did the Glorious Executioner become the bringer of holiday cheer? Unfortunately, Riot Games has not provided an official lore or backstory for this skin. However, we can imagine that Draven, in his usual extravagant fashion, decided to take on the role of Santa Claus to spread his own unique brand of joy and entertainment.

Draven's larger-than-life personality and love for attention make him a perfect fit for the role of Santa. Just like Santa Claus, Draven loves being the center of attention and enjoys putting on a show. With his flashy costume and grandiose presence, Santa Draven is sure to capture the hearts of both allies and enemies on the battlefield.

Now, let's take a closer look at Draven himself. In the world of League of Legends, Draven is a marksman champion who excels at dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. His passive ability, League of Draven, allows him to earn bonus gold by catching his spinning axes. This unique mechanic rewards players who can successfully juggle multiple axes while dealing damage to their opponents.

Draven's Q ability, Spinning Axe, empowers his next basic attack to deal bonus damage and cause his axe to ricochet off the target. This ability synergizes well with his passive, allowing him to keep his axes spinning and maximize his damage output. His W ability, Blood Rush, grants him increased movement and attack speed for a short duration, making him a formidable threat in team fights.

One of Draven's most iconic abilities is his E ability, Stand Aside. With a quick flick of his wrist, Draven throws his axes in a line, damaging and knocking aside any enemies in their path. This ability not only deals damage but also provides crowd control, allowing Draven to create opportunities for his team to engage or disengage from fights.

Finally, Draven's ultimate ability, Whirling Death, is a global skillshot that sends out two massive spinning axes in a straight line. These axes deal damage to all enemies they pass through and can be reactivated to return to Draven, dealing damage again on their way back. This ability is perfect for finishing off low-health enemies or dealing damage to multiple targets in team fights.

Draven's strengths lie in his high damage output and snowball potential. If played well, he can dominate the laning phase and carry his team to victory. However, he is also a high-risk, high-reward champion. His lack of mobility and reliance on catching axes make him vulnerable to crowd control and ganks. Additionally, his aggressive playstyle can sometimes lead to overconfidence and mistakes.

In the world of League of Legends, Draven has become an iconic champion known for his showmanship and skill. Whether it's his flashy plays or his larger-than-life personality, Draven never fails to entertain both his fans and his enemies. With the Santa Draven skin, players can experience the joy and festivity of the holiday season while dominating the battlefield.

For more information about Draven and his various appearances, including the Santa Draven skin, be sure to check out the official League of Legends website and watch videos showcasing his abilities and gameplay. Get ready to catch those axes and spread some holiday cheer with Santa Draven!

Draven (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is a flamboyant and charismatic champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his showmanship and unparalleled skill with throwing axes, Draven has become a fan favorite since his release in 2012. While he has received numerous skins over the years, his default costume remains iconic and represents the essence of his character.

The default skin for Draven showcases his larger-than-life personality and his love for the spotlight. He dons a vibrant red and gold outfit, complete with a feathered shoulder pad and a flowing cape. His hair is styled in a wild and untamed manner, reflecting his untamed spirit. Draven's face is adorned with intricate face paint, emphasizing his showmanship and theatrical nature.

The costume also features various details that highlight Draven's profession as a renowned executioner. He wears a pair of spiked gauntlets, ready to catch and throw his spinning axes with deadly precision. The axes themselves are adorned with intricate designs, showcasing the craftsmanship and attention to detail that Riot Games puts into their character designs.

Draven's default skin perfectly captures his larger-than-life personality and his desire to be the center of attention. Every movement he makes exudes confidence and arrogance, as he struts across the battlefield with a swagger that is unmatched. His voice lines are filled with cockiness and self-assuredness, further emphasizing his showmanship and love for the spotlight.

Now, let's delve into the story of Draven himself. Hailing from the city of Noxus, Draven was born into a family of executioners. From a young age, he showed exceptional talent with throwing axes, quickly becoming a local celebrity for his incredible skill. Draven's performances in the arena were legendary, drawing crowds from all over Noxus to witness his daring and precise executions.

However, Draven's rise to fame was not without its challenges. He faced constant competition from his older brother, Darius, who was also a skilled warrior in his own right. The sibling rivalry between the two brothers was fierce, with each vying for the title of Noxus' greatest executioner. This rivalry only fueled Draven's desire to outshine his brother and prove himself as the superior showman.

In the game, Draven is classified as a marksman, excelling at dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. His unique passive ability, League of Draven, rewards players who catch his spinning axes by granting bonus gold and increased attack speed. This mechanic adds an extra layer of skill and complexity to playing Draven, as players must constantly juggle catching axes while positioning themselves in team fights.

Draven's strengths lie in his ability to snowball and dominate the early game. His high damage output and aggressive playstyle make him a formidable opponent in the laning phase. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Whirling Death, allows him to deal massive damage across the map, making him a threat even when he's not directly engaged in combat.

However, Draven also has his weaknesses. He lacks mobility compared to other marksmen, making him vulnerable to assassins and champions with crowd control abilities. Additionally, his reliance on catching axes to maximize his damage output can be a double-edged sword. If he fails to catch his axes or is constantly forced to reposition, his damage potential significantly decreases.

In the world of League of Legends, Draven has become an iconic champion, beloved by players for his unique playstyle and larger-than-life personality. His default skin perfectly captures his essence, showcasing his showmanship and love for the spotlight. Whether you're a fan of his flashy plays or simply enjoy his charismatic personality, Draven is a champion that is sure to leave a lasting impression.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Draven's appearances, including his various skins. Explore the different costumes and discover the one that best suits your style. Whether you prefer the classic look of his default skin or want to try out one of his more extravagant outfits, Draven is ready to take center stage and show the world why he is the Glorious Executioner.

Draven: The Glorious Executioner

Release Date: June 6, 2012

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is a champion in the popular online multiplayer game League of Legends. Known for his flamboyant personality and unparalleled showmanship, Draven has captivated players with his unique playstyle and larger-than-life presence on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Draven, explore his strengths and weaknesses, discuss his background in the game, and highlight his significance in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Draven

Draven's story begins in the city of Noxus, a powerful and ruthless empire known for its military might and aggressive expansion. Born into a humble family, Draven's early life was marked by poverty and struggle. However, he possessed an innate talent for throwing axes, which he honed through countless hours of practice. Draven's skills quickly caught the attention of the Noxian military, and he was recruited as an executioner.

As an executioner, Draven's job was to carry out the empire's brutal punishments, often in front of large crowds. Draven reveled in the attention and adoration of the masses, and he soon became known for his extravagant performances during executions. He would juggle his spinning axes, taunt his victims, and put on a show that left the audience in awe.

Draven's fame grew rapidly, and he became a symbol of Noxian strength and dominance. However, his arrogance and thirst for attention began to overshadow his duties as an executioner. He would often prolong executions for his own amusement, disregarding the orders of his superiors. This behavior eventually caught the attention of the ruling council, who saw Draven's actions as a threat to their authority.

In an attempt to rein in Draven's reckless behavior, the council devised a plan. They would send him to the League of Legends, a renowned arena where champions from all over the world battled for glory and power. The council hoped that the League would provide a suitable outlet for Draven's insatiable need for attention, while also keeping him under control.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Draven is a marksman champion, specializing in dealing high amounts of physical damage from a distance. His unique passive ability, League of Draven, allows him to earn bonus gold by catching spinning axes that he throws. This mechanic rewards players who can successfully juggle multiple axes, adding an extra layer of skill and complexity to Draven's gameplay.

One of Draven's greatest strengths is his immense damage output. With his spinning axes, he can quickly shred through enemy champions, especially in the early game. His ultimate ability, Whirling Death, is a powerful global skillshot that deals damage to all enemies in its path, making it a deadly tool for securing kills or turning the tide of team fights.

However, Draven's strength comes at a cost. He is a high-risk, high-reward champion, meaning that mistakes can be punishing. Draven lacks mobility and has no built-in escape mechanisms, making him vulnerable to crowd control and ganks. Additionally, catching axes requires precise positioning and timing, which can be challenging in the heat of battle. Players must carefully balance aggression with caution to maximize Draven's potential.

Draven's Background in the Game

Draven was released on June 6, 2012, as the 101st champion in League of Legends. Since his introduction, he has become a fan favorite, known for his charismatic personality and flashy playstyle. Draven's popularity has led to the creation of numerous skins, each offering a unique visual and thematic twist to the champion.

On the website developed for the League of Legends game, you can access information and videos of all the skins available for Draven. From the classic Primetime Draven skin, which transforms him into a charismatic TV show host, to the legendary Soul Reaver Draven skin, which gives him a dark and menacing appearance, there is a skin to suit every player's taste.

Draven's place in the game is that of a high-damage carry who excels in snowballing the early game. His ability to quickly accumulate gold through his passive allows him to purchase powerful items earlier than most champions, giving him a significant advantage. However, Draven's effectiveness diminishes in the late game when enemy tanks and assassins become more difficult to deal with. Players must capitalize on Draven's early game dominance to secure objectives and build a lead for their team.

Furthermore, Draven's larger-than-life personality and showmanship have made him a popular choice for professional players and streamers. His flashy plays and entertaining playstyle make for exciting moments that captivate audiences and create memorable experiences.

In Conclusion

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is a champion who embodies the spirit of showmanship and skill in the world of League of Legends. With his flamboyant personality, unique playstyle, and high-risk, high-reward gameplay, Draven has become a beloved character among players. Whether you are drawn to his charismatic persona or enticed by the challenge of mastering his axe juggling mechanics, Draven offers a thrilling and rewarding experience on the battlefield.

Visit our website to explore all the skins available for Draven and witness the glory of the Glorious Executioner in action!

Draven (Gladiator Draven)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: August 29, 2012

Gladiator Draven is a skin for the champion Draven in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on August 29, 2012, and can be purchased for 975 RP. It offers a unique and visually appealing look for the champion, transforming him into a fierce and formidable gladiator.

The Gladiator Draven skin features Draven dressed in traditional gladiator attire, complete with a helmet, chest plate, and arm guards. His signature spinning axes are replaced with gladiator-style weapons, adding an extra touch of flair to his already flashy playstyle. The skin also includes new visual effects for his abilities, giving them a more ancient and powerful feel.

As a champion, Draven is known for his showmanship and arrogance, and the Gladiator Draven skin perfectly captures his larger-than-life personality. With his striking appearance and confident demeanor, he commands attention on the battlefield and demands respect from his opponents.

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is a ranged AD carry champion in League of Legends. He is a high-risk, high-reward champion who excels at dealing massive amounts of damage. His unique passive ability, League of Draven, allows him to earn bonus gold by catching his spinning axes, rewarding players who can successfully juggle multiple axes during combat.

Draven's strengths lie in his ability to quickly burst down enemies with his spinning axes and his ultimate ability, Whirling Death. His axes deal significant damage, especially when combined with critical strikes and attack speed items. Additionally, his Blood Rush ability grants him increased movement and attack speed, making him a formidable duelist.

However, Draven's aggressive playstyle also comes with weaknesses. He lacks mobility and crowd control, making him vulnerable to crowd control effects and ganks from the enemy team. Positioning is crucial for Draven players, as getting caught out of position can quickly lead to his demise. Additionally, his reliance on catching axes can be a double-edged sword, as dropping an axe can significantly reduce his damage output.

In the lore of League of Legends, Draven is a former executioner from Noxus who found his true calling as a champion in the League. He is known for his extravagant performances and his desire for fame and glory. Draven's ruthless nature and thirst for attention make him a perfect fit for the gladiator theme of the Gladiator Draven skin.

Overall, the Gladiator Draven skin offers players a visually stunning and thematically fitting option for showcasing their skills as the Glorious Executioner. Whether you're a fan of Draven's flashy playstyle or simply appreciate the aesthetics of the skin, Gladiator Draven is a worthy addition to any player's collection.

For more information about Draven and his various appearances in League of Legends, including videos showcasing his abilities and skins, be sure to visit this page.

Draven (La Ilusión Draven)

Cost: [RP]

Release Date: [Date]

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is known for his flamboyant personality and his incredible skill in the League of Legends. With his charismatic presence and deadly spinning axes, he has become a fan favorite among players. One of his most iconic skins is

which adds a touch of magic and illusion to his already impressive appearance.

Released on [Date],

is a skin that transforms Draven into a mesmerizing showman. With vibrant colors and a circus-inspired theme, this skin truly captures the essence of Draven's extravagant personality. The skin features a new model for Draven, complete with a top hat, a stylish suit, and a cape adorned with playing cards. His spinning axes are replaced with juggling pins, adding an extra flair to his deadly attacks.

But the visual changes are not the only thing that makes

special. The skin also includes new animations and sound effects that enhance the overall experience. From the way Draven catches his axes to the sound of applause when he scores a kill, every detail has been carefully crafted to immerse players in the world of the circus.

Now, let's take a closer look at Draven himself. Known for his showmanship and arrogance, Draven is a champion who thrives on attention. His passive ability, League of Draven, rewards him with bonus gold for catching his spinning axes. This unique mechanic adds an extra layer of skill and precision to playing Draven, as players must constantly position themselves to catch their axes while dealing damage to their opponents.

Draven's Q ability, Spinning Axe, allows him to throw a spinning axe in a targeted direction. If he catches the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced, allowing him to throw another axe in quick succession. This ability synergizes perfectly with his passive, as catching axes not only increases his damage output but also reduces the cooldown of his abilities.

His W ability, Blood Rush, grants Draven bonus attack speed and movement speed for a short duration. Activating this ability also removes the attack speed cap temporarily, allowing Draven to unleash a flurry of devastating attacks. This ability is crucial for chasing down enemies or escaping dangerous situations.

Draven's E ability, Stand Aside, is a skillshot that damages and knocks aside enemies in its path. This ability can be used to interrupt enemy abilities, peel for allies, or simply deal damage in team fights. Its versatility makes it an essential tool in Draven's kit.

Finally, Draven's ultimate ability, Whirling Death, is a global skillshot that sends out spinning axes in a straight line, damaging all enemies in their path. The axes can be reactivated to return to Draven, dealing additional damage. This ability is perfect for finishing off low-health enemies or turning the tide of a team fight from afar.

Draven's strengths lie in his high damage output and his ability to snowball a game. If played well, he can quickly become a formidable force on the battlefield, dominating his opponents with his relentless aggression. However, his reliance on catching axes and his lack of mobility make him vulnerable to crowd control and ganks. Players must carefully position themselves and make calculated decisions to maximize Draven's potential.

In the world of League of Legends, Draven is not just a champion but also an entertainer. His larger-than-life personality and his flashy playstyle have made him a beloved character among players. Whether you're a fan of his showmanship or simply enjoy his high-risk, high-reward playstyle, Draven is a champion that demands attention.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Draven's appearances, including the mesmerizing
skin. Explore the world of Draven and unleash your inner showman in the League of Legends!

Draven (Fright Night Draven)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: October 29, 2013

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is known for his flamboyant personality and his incredible skill in the League of Legends. With his larger-than-life persona and his deadly spinning axes, Draven has become a fan favorite among players. And now, he's ready to take center stage in a new skin: Fright Night Draven.

Fright Night Draven is a skin that perfectly captures the essence of Halloween. Released on October 29, 2013, this skin transforms Draven into a fearsome creature of the night. With his dark and sinister appearance, Fright Night Draven strikes fear into the hearts of his opponents.

The costume features Draven wearing a black and purple suit, adorned with spooky details. His signature axes are replaced with wicked-looking scythes, adding an extra touch of terror to his attacks. The skin also includes new visual effects, such as eerie green particles and a haunting recall animation.

But the Fright Night Draven skin is more than just a visual upgrade. It also brings a new level of immersion to the game. When playing as Fright Night Draven, you'll feel the thrill of Halloween as you dominate the battlefield. The skin's dark and menacing aesthetic adds an extra layer of excitement to every match.

Now, let's take a closer look at Draven himself. Known as the Glorious Executioner, Draven is a champion who thrives on attention and adoration. He revels in the spotlight and craves the applause of the crowd. With his extravagant personality and his showmanship, Draven is a true entertainer.

In the game, Draven's strengths lie in his high damage output and his ability to snowball. His spinning axes deal massive damage, especially when caught and thrown with precision. Draven's passive, League of Draven, rewards him with bonus gold for catching his spinning axes, allowing him to quickly amass wealth and become a formidable force on the battlefield.

However, Draven's showmanship comes at a cost. His arrogance and thirst for attention can sometimes lead to overconfidence, making him vulnerable to crowd control and ganks. Draven players need to carefully balance their aggression with caution to avoid falling behind in the game.

Draven's past in the game is filled with memorable moments. From his flashy plays in professional matches to his hilarious interactions with other champions, Draven has left a lasting impression on the League of Legends community. His unique playstyle and larger-than-life personality have made him a favorite pick for players who enjoy a mix of skill and showmanship.

Whether you're a fan of Draven or simply curious about his different appearances, this page is your go-to resource. Here, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Draven's skins, including the fearsome Fright Night Draven. So, get ready to step into the spotlight and dominate the battlefield with Draven's Fright Night skin.

Draven (Pool Party Draven)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: July 29, 2013

Pool Party Draven is a skin for the champion Draven in the popular online game League of Legends. Released on July 29, 2013, this skin is part of the Pool Party skin line, which features champions in fun and summery outfits. With its vibrant colors and playful theme, Pool Party Draven is a favorite among players who enjoy adding a touch of lightheartedness to their gameplay.

As the name suggests, Pool Party Draven transforms the champion into a beach-loving showman. Draven, known for his extravagant personality and showmanship, embraces the summer vibes with this skin. He trades his usual gladiator-inspired attire for a more casual beach outfit, complete with swim trunks, flip-flops, and a tank top. His signature axes are replaced with inflatable pool toys, adding a humorous twist to his deadly arsenal.

The Pool Party Draven skin also brings several visual and audio effects to enhance the player's experience. Draven's recall animation shows him lounging on a beach chair while sipping a refreshing drink, and his ultimate ability, Whirling Death, features a unique animation where the axes are thrown like boomerangs. The sound effects are also modified to match the playful theme, with splashing water and cheerful tunes accompanying Draven's abilities.

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is a champion known for his flamboyant personality and incredible skill in the game. He is a ranged AD carry, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. Draven's passive ability, League of Draven, rewards players who catch his spinning axes by granting bonus gold and attack speed. This unique mechanic adds an extra layer of skill and complexity to playing Draven, as players must constantly juggle catching axes while positioning themselves in team fights.

Draven's strengths lie in his ability to snowball and dominate the game. With his high damage output and snowball potential, he can quickly become a formidable force in the hands of a skilled player. His Spinning Axe ability allows him to deal massive damage to enemies, especially when catching multiple axes in quick succession. Draven's ultimate ability, Whirling Death, is a global skillshot that can deal significant damage to multiple enemies, making it a powerful tool for turning the tides of team fights.

However, Draven also has his weaknesses. He lacks mobility compared to some other AD carries, making him vulnerable to crowd control and ganks. Positioning is crucial for Draven players, as getting caught out of position can quickly lead to their demise. Additionally, Draven's reliance on catching axes can be a double-edged sword. While it rewards skilled players, it also introduces an element of risk, as dropping axes can significantly reduce his damage output.

In the lore of League of Legends, Draven is a former executioner from Noxus who found his true calling as a showman in the League. He revels in the attention and adoration of the crowd, always seeking to put on a grand spectacle. Draven's arrogance and self-confidence are unmatched, and he believes himself to be the greatest champion in the League. His catchphrase,

has become iconic among players and is often shouted in-game to celebrate successful plays.

Draven's place in the game is that of a high-risk, high-reward champion. Skilled Draven players can dominate the game and carry their team to victory, but mastering his unique mechanics requires practice and precision. His flashy playstyle and larger-than-life personality have made him a fan favorite, with many players drawn to his showmanship and the satisfaction of landing skillful axe catches.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Draven, including the Pool Party Draven skin. Whether you're a fan of his extravagant personality or simply enjoy playing a champion who can deal massive damage, Draven is a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice.

Draven (Primetime Draven)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: August 29, 2013

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is one of the most flamboyant and charismatic champions in the League of Legends. Known for his showmanship and larger-than-life personality, Draven has captured the hearts of fans worldwide. And what better way to showcase his star power than with his Primetime Draven skin?

Released on August 29, 2013, Primetime Draven is a skin that truly embodies the essence of a superstar. Priced at 975 RP, this skin transforms Draven into a charismatic TV host, complete with a flashy suit, microphone, and a camera strapped to his shoulder. With Primetime Draven, you can take center stage and show off your skills in style.

The attention to detail in Primetime Draven is truly remarkable. From the sleek black suit adorned with golden accents to the perfectly coiffed hair, every aspect of this skin exudes elegance and showmanship. The camera on Draven's shoulder adds an extra touch of authenticity, as if he's always ready to capture his best moments on screen.

But it's not just the visual appeal that makes Primetime Draven special. The skin also features unique animations and sound effects that enhance the overall experience. When Draven catches his spinning axes, the crowd erupts in applause, and his recall animation shows him striking a pose while the camera pans around him. These small details add depth to the skin and make playing as Primetime Draven a truly immersive experience.

Now, let's delve into the story of Draven and his place in the League of Legends. Draven, whose full name is Darius Draven, was born and raised in the city of Noxus. From a young age, he showed a natural talent for combat and a thirst for attention. Draven's skills with throwing axes were unmatched, and he quickly became a crowd favorite in the Noxian arenas.

Driven by his desire for fame and glory, Draven joined the League of Legends, where he could showcase his skills on a global stage. His performances in the arena were nothing short of spectacular, as he dazzled the audience with his acrobatic axe throws and showboating antics. Draven's larger-than-life personality and undeniable talent made him a fan favorite, and he relished in the adoration of his supporters.

However, Draven's arrogance and thirst for attention often overshadowed his true abilities. While he was undoubtedly a skilled warrior, his showmanship sometimes led to reckless decisions and unnecessary risks. This flaw in his character became apparent during the Ionian conflict, where Draven's desire for glory led him to make questionable choices that put his team at a disadvantage.

Despite his flaws, Draven remains a beloved champion in the League of Legends. His unique playstyle, centered around catching and juggling spinning axes, requires precision and quick reflexes. Draven players must constantly position themselves to catch their axes while dealing damage to their opponents, making him a high-risk, high-reward champion.

Draven's strengths lie in his ability to snowball and dominate the early game. With his high damage output and aggressive playstyle, he can quickly establish a lead and become a formidable force on the battlefield. His ultimate ability, Whirling Death, allows him to deal massive damage to multiple enemies from a long range, making him a threat even from afar.

However, Draven's weaknesses become apparent in the later stages of the game. If he falls behind or fails to maintain his lead, he can struggle to catch up and make an impact. Additionally, his reliance on catching spinning axes makes him predictable and vulnerable to crowd control effects. Skilled opponents can exploit this weakness and shut down Draven's damage output.

In conclusion, Primetime Draven is a skin that perfectly captures the essence of Draven's larger-than-life personality. With its attention to detail, unique animations, and sound effects, this skin allows players to step into the shoes of a superstar. Whether you're a fan of Draven's showmanship or simply appreciate a well-designed skin, Primetime Draven is a must-have for any League of Legends player.

For more information about Draven and to see all of his appearances in the game, including Primetime Draven, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the Glorious Executioner. Watch videos, learn about his abilities, and discover the true power of Draven in the League of Legends.

Draven (Mecha Kingdoms Draven)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: January 15, 2020

League of Legends is known for its diverse and visually stunning skins, and one of the most impressive additions to the game is the

skin. This skin, released on January 15, 2020, is part of the Mecha Kingdoms skin line, which features champions transformed into powerful mecha warriors. Draven, the Glorious Executioner, has received a futuristic makeover with this skin, turning him into a formidable force on the battlefield.

The

skin is priced at 1350 RP, offering players a chance to experience the thrill of playing as a high-tech version of the iconic champion. With its unique visual effects, animations, and sound effects, this skin truly brings a new level of excitement to the game.

The Story of Mecha Kingdoms Draven

In the alternate universe of Mecha Kingdoms, Draven is a renowned gladiator who has risen to fame through his unparalleled skill and showmanship. In this futuristic world, powerful factions vie for control, and Draven has aligned himself with the Mecha Kingdoms, a group of technologically advanced warriors.

As a member of the Mecha Kingdoms, Draven dons a suit of mechanized armor that enhances his already impressive abilities. The armor is adorned with intricate details, glowing blue accents, and sharp edges, reflecting the advanced technology of the Mecha Kingdoms. With his new appearance, Draven becomes an even more imposing figure, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.

The

skin features a number of unique visual and audio effects that make playing as Draven an immersive experience. His spinning axes are transformed into electrified blades, crackling with energy as they slice through the air. When catching his axes, the sound of metal clashing and sparks flying adds to the intensity of the gameplay.

Additionally, Draven's abilities receive a futuristic makeover. His Q ability, Spinning Axe, now unleashes a burst of energy upon impact, leaving a trail of glowing particles in its wake. Stand Aside, his E ability, creates a shockwave that ripples through the ground, leaving behind a trail of glowing energy. And when activating his ultimate ability, Whirling Death, Draven launches a massive energy disc that cuts through enemies, leaving a trail of destruction in its path.

Draven: The Glorious Executioner

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is a champion known for his showmanship and unparalleled skill in combat. He is a ranged AD carry who excels at dealing massive damage and dominating the battlefield. With his spinning axes and flashy moves, Draven is a force to be reckoned with.

Draven's strengths lie in his high damage output and ability to snowball in the early game. His Q ability, Spinning Axe, allows him to throw spinning axes that deal bonus damage and can be caught to reduce the cooldown. This unique mechanic rewards skilled players who can catch their axes while maintaining their positioning in team fights.

Another strength of Draven is his passive ability, League of Draven. This ability grants him bonus gold for killing minions and champions, allowing him to accumulate wealth quickly and become a formidable threat in the late game.

However, Draven also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. He lacks mobility and relies heavily on positioning to avoid being caught out by enemy crowd control. Additionally, his reliance on catching axes can make him predictable, as enemies can anticipate his movements and attempt to disrupt his rhythm.

In the lore of League of Legends, Draven is a former executioner from Noxus who found his true calling in the gladiatorial arenas. He revels in the attention and adoration of the crowd, always seeking to put on a show. Draven's arrogance and self-confidence are unmatched, making him a polarizing figure among the champions of the League.

In the game, Draven's playstyle revolves around his ability to catch and juggle his spinning axes. Skilled players can maximize their damage output by constantly catching and throwing axes while maneuvering around the battlefield. Draven's ultimate ability, Whirling Death, is a global skillshot that can deal massive damage to multiple enemies, making him a threat even from afar.

Whether you're a fan of Draven's flashy playstyle or simply appreciate the stunning visuals of the

skin, this champion is sure to leave a lasting impression. With his larger-than-life personality and powerful presence, Draven is a force to be reckoned with on the Fields of Justice.

Draven (Draven Draven)

RP Cost: 1820 RP

Release Date: April 1, 2018

Draven Draven, the skin that takes self-obsession to a whole new level, is a legendary skin for the champion Draven in the popular online game League of Legends. Released on April 1, 2018, this skin is a hilarious and unique addition to Draven's collection of appearances.

Draven Draven is priced at 1820 RP, making it one of the more expensive skins in the game. However, its comical nature and the sheer absurdity of seeing Draven's face plastered all over his body make it well worth the investment for fans of the champion.

The Story of Draven Draven

Draven Draven is a skin that embraces Draven's already inflated ego and takes it to the extreme. In this skin, Draven's entire body is covered in images of his own face, creating a truly narcissistic and attention-seeking appearance. From head to toe, every inch of Draven's outfit is adorned with his own visage, making it impossible to ignore his self-obsession.

The skin features Draven wearing a golden armor with his signature axes, but what truly sets it apart is the multitude of Draven faces that cover his body. From his helmet to his boots, every piece of his attire is emblazoned with his own image, creating a truly unique and eye-catching look.

Draven Draven also includes new visual and sound effects. When Draven activates his ultimate ability, the iconic spinning axes, the faces on his body come to life, spinning along with the axes. The sound effects are also modified to match the theme, with Draven's voice lines emphasizing his self-obsession and arrogance.

Draven's Story and Role in League of Legends

Draven, known as the Glorious Executioner, is a champion in League of Legends who thrives on attention and showmanship. He is a ranged AD carry, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. With his spinning axes and flashy abilities, Draven is a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

Draven's past in the game is filled with glory and fame. He hails from Noxus, a powerful and ruthless empire in the game's lore. Draven rose to prominence as a gladiator in the League of Legends, where he showcased his skills and entertained the masses with his extravagant performances.

Draven's playstyle revolves around catching and juggling his spinning axes. His Q ability, Spinning Axe, allows him to throw an axe that will bounce back to him if he catches it. This mechanic adds an extra layer of skill and precision to playing Draven, as players must constantly position themselves to catch their axes while dealing damage to their enemies.

Draven's strengths lie in his high damage output and his ability to snowball a game. If he gets ahead early on, he can become an unstoppable force, shredding through enemy champions with ease. His ultimate ability, Whirling Death, is a global skillshot that deals massive damage to all enemies in its path, making it a powerful tool for securing kills and turning team fights in his favor.

However, Draven also has his weaknesses. He lacks mobility and is vulnerable to crowd control effects, making him an easy target for assassins and champions with crowd control abilities. Additionally, his reliance on catching his axes can be a double-edged sword, as dropping an axe can significantly reduce his damage output.

Despite his weaknesses, Draven remains a popular and beloved champion among League of Legends players. His flashy playstyle and larger-than-life personality make him a joy to watch and play. With the addition of the Draven Draven skin, players can now enjoy an extra dose of Draven's self-obsession and showmanship.

Explore Draven's Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Draven's appearances, including the legendary Draven Draven skin. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or want to embrace his over-the-top self-obsession, Draven has a skin for every taste.

So, gather your axes and step into the spotlight with Draven Draven, the skin that takes self-obsession to a whole new level. Show off your style and bask in the glory of your own face plastered all over your body. With Draven Draven, you'll truly be the center of attention on the Rift.

Draven (Ruined Draven)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: April 29, 2021

Draven, the Glorious Executioner, is known for his flamboyant personality and his unmatched skill in the League of Legends. With his signature spinning axes and showmanship, he has captivated audiences and struck fear into the hearts of his opponents. However, in the alternate universe of the Ruined King, Draven's story takes a dark turn with the release of his Ruined Draven skin.

The Ruined Draven skin is a part of the Ruined King event, which introduced a new storyline and a set of skins that depict champions corrupted by the Black Mist. This skin transforms Draven into a haunting figure, consumed by the darkness that surrounds him. His once vibrant and colorful outfit is now tattered and torn, reflecting the decay and despair of the Ruined King's realm.

One of the most striking features of the Ruined Draven skin is the change in his axes. Instead of the usual spinning blades, his axes are now twisted and corrupted, emanating an eerie purple glow. As he throws them, they leave behind a trail of dark mist, adding to the ominous atmosphere of the skin. The sound effects have also been modified to match the theme, with a haunting echo accompanying each axe throw.

Furthermore, Ruined Draven's recall animation showcases his descent into darkness. He is seen standing on a crumbling platform, surrounded by the Black Mist. As he recalls, the mist engulfs him, and he disappears into the void, leaving only his axes behind. This animation perfectly captures the essence of the Ruined King event and the tragic fate that awaits those who succumb to the Black Mist.

Now, let's delve into the lore of Draven and his place in the League of Legends. Draven, born as Draaven, was a child prodigy in the art of throwing axes. He honed his skills in the streets of Noxus, performing for crowds and earning his place as the city's most renowned executioner. His performances were not only about executing criminals but also about entertaining the masses with his extravagant displays of skill and showmanship.

Draven's rise to fame in the League of Legends was swift. His incredible axe-throwing abilities and his larger-than-life personality made him an instant fan favorite. He reveled in the attention and adoration, basking in the glory of the arena. However, his arrogance and thirst for fame often overshadowed his true potential as a warrior.

Despite his flamboyant nature, Draven is a formidable champion on the Rift. His passive ability, League of Draven, allows him to earn bonus gold for catching his spinning axes, incentivizing players to constantly juggle their axes to maximize their damage output. His Q ability, Spinning Axe, empowers his next basic attack, causing it to deal bonus damage and apply on-hit effects. This ability synergizes well with his passive, making him a fearsome duelist.

Draven's W ability, Blood Rush, grants him increased movement speed and attack speed for a short duration. This ability not only helps him chase down enemies but also allows him to reposition himself in team fights, making him a slippery target. His E ability, Stand Aside, is a skillshot that damages and knocks aside enemies, providing crowd control and utility in team fights.

Finally, Draven's ultimate ability, Whirling Death, is a global skillshot that sends out spinning axes in a straight line, damaging all enemies in their path. The axes can be reactivated to return to Draven, dealing additional damage. This ability has the potential to turn the tide of a team fight or secure kills from across the map, making it a powerful tool in Draven's arsenal.

Draven's strengths lie in his high damage output and his ability to snowball in the early game. His passive and Q ability allow him to deal massive damage with his basic attacks, especially when he catches his spinning axes. His W ability provides him with mobility and attack speed, making him a threat in both skirmishes and team fights. Additionally, his ultimate ability can be a game-changer, providing global presence and the potential for multi-kills.

However, Draven's weaknesses stem from his lack of mobility and his reliance on catching his spinning axes. If he fails to catch his axes or is unable to position himself properly, his damage output significantly decreases. Furthermore, he is vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage, as he lacks defensive abilities to protect himself.

In conclusion, Draven's Ruined Draven skin offers players a glimpse into an alternate reality where the Glorious Executioner has fallen victim to the corruption of the Black Mist. With its haunting visuals and thematic abilities, this skin adds a dark twist to Draven's character. Whether you're a fan of Draven or simply enjoy collecting unique and visually stunning skins, Ruined Draven is a must-have addition to your collection.

For more information about Draven and his various appearances in the League of Legends, including videos showcasing his abilities and skins, be sure to visit our page dedicated to the Glorious Executioner.

The Story of Draven

Draven's story begins in the city of Noxus, a powerful and ruthless empire known for its military might. Born into a humble family, Draven always had a flair for the dramatic and a hunger for attention. He found his calling as an executioner, relishing in the cheers of the crowd as he performed his deadly acts.

His skills as an executioner caught the attention of the Noxian High Command, who saw his potential as a symbol of Noxian strength and power. Draven became a gladiator of sorts, fighting in the League of Legends to showcase Noxus' dominance. His performances were nothing short of spectacular, with his spinning axes and acrobatic maneuvers captivating audiences worldwide.

Draven's strengths lie in his incredible damage output and his ability to control the battlefield. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Whirling Death, can deal devastating damage to multiple enemies, making it a powerful tool for turning the tide of battle.

However, Draven is not without his weaknesses. He lacks mobility and relies heavily on positioning to maximize his damage output. Additionally, his aggressive playstyle can leave him vulnerable to crowd control effects and coordinated enemy attacks. Players must carefully balance risk and reward when playing as Draven, as one wrong move can quickly turn the tide against him.

In the world of League of Legends, Draven has become an iconic figure. His larger-than-life personality and showmanship have made him a fan favorite, with players drawn to his flashy playstyle and unique character design.
